snippet: Also on the Minute, ExxonMobil faces a lawsuit over alligators and the television critic Alessandra Stanley reviews the new HBO comedy, “Doll & Em.”
abstract: Also on the Minute, ExxonMobil faces a lawsuit over alligators and the television critic Alessandra Stanley reviews the new HBO comedy, “Doll & Em.”

byline.original: By MONA EL NAGGAR and CHRISTIAN ROMAN

headline.kicker: The New York Times News Minute
